title: Jay Leno, 74, gives emotional update on wife Mavis, 77, following her 'advanced' dementia diagnosis
text:
Jay Leno gave an emotional update about his wife, Mavis, and revealed how they get through the days when she is ‘a bit down’ in the midst of her struggle with dementia.
The TV personality, 74 – which was recently seen as bruising after his fall of a hill – People In an article published on Thursday, he tries to find ‘the humor’ and ‘fun’ and ‘have fun’ despite her condition.
Last year in April, the former Tonight Show -Guestheer was granted the conservatory of Mavis after a court revealed that she recognizes ‘sometimes not him’ and does not remember her own date of birth.
While promoting his latest project, Midas Man, Leno expressed the outlet that he still wants to find ‘your moments when you can laugh and have fun. You try to find the humor in this situation. ‘
‘I took my wife shopping, I can see that she is a bit down, [so I said]”Come on, we’re going to the shopping center.”
Jay remembered: “So we go to Nordstrom’s and I said,” Do you see something that you like? ” “No, no.” So we look at the shoes, and [she says]”Oh, I love these sneakers.” ‘

The star explained that Mavis saw a few ‘Bright Blue Sneakers’ and he told her that she had to find a second pair of shoes that she also liked.
She soon came across red and white -colored sneakers in the mall. “So I see she is happy and I said,” This is great. ” So I got two pairs of sneakers, and [the cashier says] “That’s $ 24. And the other pair, that’s $ 847.” ‘
“I’m going:” No, I only had two pairs of sneakers. I thought this was $ 24. ‘ [The cashier] says: “Yes, these are $ 24. But the other were [designer sneakers]. “”
Leno added: “It seemed that the man took a few of the same sneakers and used a Bedazzler on them, and they were $ 800. I look at my wife and said:” Do you like this? ” I am going: “Honey, you look great.” ‘
Jay then said to people: ‘It’s fine, I’m glad I can afford this and it made my wife happy. It just made me laugh. Simply typical. I thought the pair of $ 24 looked better than that, but that’s okay. ‘
‘It just made me laugh, and I think if you are dealing with things like this, you will find your moments when you can laugh and have fun, and my wife really likes them and felt good about it. ‘
Leno said jokes: ‘So the fact that it was the same pair of sneakers who was hit with a Bedazzler, I think that’s fine. But it just made me laugh, and that’s almost what it is. ‘
